include/physicalmodels/numa3d.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002  *
00003  * 3D Nonhydrostatic Unified Model of the Atmosphere (NUMA)
00004  *
00005  * References:
00006  *
00007  * F.X. Giraldo, M. Restelli, and M. Laeuter, "Semi-Implicit 
00008  * Formulations of the Euler Equations: Applications to 
00009  * Nonhydrostatic Atmospheric Modeling", SIAM J. Sci. Comp., 
00010  * Vol. 32, 3394-3425 (2010)
00011  *
00012  * J.F. Kelly and F.X. Giraldo, "Continuous and Discontinuous 
00013  * Galerkin Methods for a Scalable 3D Nonhydrostatic Atmospheric 
00014  * Model:  limited-area mode", J. Comp. Phys., Vol. 231, 7988-8008 
00015  * (2012)
00016  *
00017  * N. Ahmad and J. Lindeman, "Euler solutions using flux-based wave 
00018  * decomposition", Intl. J. Num. Method. Fluid., Vol. 54 (1), 
00019  * 47-72 (2007)
00020  *
00021 */
00022 
00023 #include <basic.h>
00024 #include <mathfunctions.h>
00025 
00026 #define _NUMA3D_ "numa3d"
00027 
00028 /* define ndims and nvars for this model */
00029 #undef _MODEL_NDIMS_
00030 #undef _MODEL_NVARS_
00031 #define _MODEL_NDIMS_ 3
00032 #define _MODEL_NVARS_ 5
00033 
00034 /* grid directions */
00035 #define _XDIR_ 0
00036 #define _YDIR_ 1
00037 #define _ZDIR_ 2
00038 
00039 #define _Numa3DGetFlowVars_(u,drho,uvel,vvel,wvel,dT,rho0) \
00040   { \
00041     drho = u[0]; \
00042     uvel = u[1]/(rho0+drho); \
00043     vvel = u[2]/(rho0+drho); \
00044     wvel = u[3]/(rho0+drho); \
00045     dT   = u[4]; \
00046   }
00047 
00048 #define _Numa3DSetFlux_(f,dir,drho,uvel,vvel,wvel,dT,dP,rho0,T0) \
00049   { \
00050     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00051       f[0] = (rho0+drho) * uvel; \
00052       f[1] = (rho0+drho)*uvel*uvel + dP; \
00053       f[2] = (rho0+drho)*uvel*vvel; \
00054       f[3] = (rho0+drho)*uvel*wvel; \
00055       f[4] = uvel*(dT+T0); \
00056     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00057       f[0] = (rho0+drho) * vvel; \
00058       f[1] = (rho0+drho)*uvel*vvel; \
00059       f[2] = (rho0+drho)*vvel*vvel + dP; \
00060       f[3] = (rho0+drho)*wvel*vvel; \
00061       f[4] = vvel*(dT+T0); \
00062     } else if (dir == _ZDIR_) { \
00063       f[0] = (rho0+drho) * wvel; \
00064       f[1] = (rho0+drho)*uvel*wvel; \
00065       f[2] = (rho0+drho)*vvel*wvel; \
00066       f[3] = (rho0+drho)*wvel*wvel + dP; \
00067       f[4] = wvel*(dT+T0); \
00068     } \
00069   }
00070 
00071 #define _Numa3DSetLinearFlux_(f,dir,drho,uvel,vvel,wvel,dT,dP,rho0,T0) \
00072   { \
00073     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00074       f[0] = (rho0+drho) * uvel; \
00075       f[1] = dP; \
00076       f[2] = 0.0; \
00077       f[3] = 0.0; \
00078       f[4] = (rho0+drho)*uvel*T0/rho0; \
00079     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00080       f[0] = (rho0+drho) * vvel; \
00081       f[1] = 0.0; \
00082       f[2] = dP; \
00083       f[3] = 0.0; \
00084       f[4] = (rho0+drho)*vvel*T0/rho0; \
00085     } else if (dir == _ZDIR_) { \
00086       f[0] = (rho0+drho) * wvel; \
00087       f[1] = 0.0; \
00088       f[2] = 0.0; \
00089       f[3] = dP; \
00090       f[4] = (rho0+drho)*wvel*T0/rho0; \
00091     } \
00092   }
00093 
00094 #define _Numa3DSetSource_(s,param,uvel,vvel,drho,rho0) \
00095   { \
00096     s[0] =  0.0; \
00097     s[1] =  2.0*param->Omega*vvel*(rho0+drho); \
00098     s[2] = -2.0*param->Omega*uvel*(rho0+drho); \
00099     s[3] = -param->g*drho; \
00100     s[4] =  0.0; \
00101   }
00102 
00103 #define _Numa3DComputePressure_(params,T0,dT,P0,dP) \
00104   { \
00105     double gamma    = params->gamma; \
00106     double Pref     = params->Pref; \
00107     double R        = params->R; \
00108     double P_total  = Pref * raiseto((R*(T0+dT)/Pref),gamma); \
00109     dP  = P_total - P0; \
00110   }
00111 
00112 #define _Numa3DComputeLinearizedPressure_(params,T0,dT,P0,dP) \
00113   { \
00114     double gamma    = params->gamma; \
00115     dP  = (gamma*P0/T0) * dT; \
00116   }
00117 
00118 #define _Numa3DComputeSpeedofSound_(gamma,R,T0,dT,rho0,drho,EP,c) \
00119   { \
00120     c = sqrt(gamma*R*(T0+dT)*EP/(rho0+drho)); \
00121   }
00122 
00123 #define _Numa3DComputeLinearizedSpeedofSound_(gamma,R,T0,rho0,EP,c) \
00124   { \
00125     c = sqrt(gamma*R*T0*EP/rho0); \
00126   }
00127 
00128 typedef struct numa3d_parameters {
00129   double  gamma;      /* Ratio of heat capacities       */
00130   double  R;          /* Universal gas constant         */
00131   double  Omega;      /* Angular speed of Earth         */
00132   double  g;          /* acceleration due to gravity    */
00133   int     init_atmos; /* choice of initial atmosphere   */
00134 
00135   /* pressure & temperature at zero altitude */
00136   double Pref, Tref;
00137 
00138   /* function to calculate hydrostatically balanced flow variables */
00139   void (*StandardAtmosphere)(void*,double,double*,double*,double*,double*);
00140 
00141   /* choice of upwinding scheme */
00142   char upwind[_MAX_STRING_SIZE_];
00143 } Numa3D;
00144 
00145 int Numa3DInitialize (void*,void*);
00146 int Numa3DCleanup    (void*);
00147 
00148 /* Available upwinding schemes */
00149 #define _RUSANOV_UPWINDING_ "rusanov"
00150 #define _RF_CHAR_UPWINDING_ "rf-char" /* does not work! */
